Overview

Voicemod is a real-time voice changing app for use with meeting apps such as Discord, Google Meet, Zoom but not just! Our users typically use it within games when theyâ€™re streaming or just playing with friends.

Along with Marta, I was the one half of the main Voicemod designers team for MacOS.
